channel.title: Okay I really need help here (imma noob)
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/2nbgi1i.jpg[/img] okay I'm pretty sure i just leave that one the way it is right? [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/1zekojk.jpg[/img] also do i leave that the same? FYI this is no-ip. but yea. do i just leave those the same? [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/2jcapn6.jpg[/img] also thats my portforward? can someone explain please on what i do there?
this is my windows firewall exeptions [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/e6aa84.jpg[/img] what should i put here? really need help =] it'd be great if i could get some really really detailed instructions on what to do you can also email me at gavinsamsal@hotmail.com if you plan on sending me pretty much a tut. Thanks =]

item.title: Okay I really need help here (imma noob)
item.dc:creator: @GavinSamsal GavinSamsal
item.description:
@GavinSamsal wrote:


Okay what one do i do? single port forwarding? or portrange forwarding?
They are both the same page pretty much. they have protocall and stuff.
no clue which one to do =\ please someone need help

Read full topic
item.source: Okay I really need help here (imma noob)

item.title: Okay I really need help here (imma noob)
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

43594 to 43594
protocol TCIP
to find out your ipaddress click start bottom leffed click run, type CMD, a black box will come up type “ipconfig” with out the " " you will see a set of numbers like 192.168.2.______ the number should be 1 - 100 where the _____ is. and that number is your Local IPADDRESS. dont worry about the number 192.168.2.1 or 255.255.255.0

Read full topic
